column3:
> No speed up observed?

Strange.

I wonder how much our tests are really bound by I/O speed. I guess it could matter for compilation times. But I wouldn't be surprised if it's mostly CPU bound.

It seems this will result in a slow-down. E.g. https://cirrus-ci.com/task/6631575736549376?command=ci#L5821 vs https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5477946514210816?command=ci#L5513\n\nLooks like it is only using 0.3 CPU even though 2 have been requested?
Let's revisit this some other time
Not sure what happened in the meantime, but there seems to be a speedup now. (Also the fuzz task is passing and no longer timing out)
